notesStmt.note: A reissue, with added general title page and conjugate blank, of "The Christians prayer for the Churches peace" (printed by John Dawson), "Baruch's sore gently opened; God's salve skilfully applied" (printed by Richard Badger), and "The arraignement of covetousnesse" (printed by Richard Badger). In the first part, "A sermon upon 1 Sam, 2.30" has separate dated title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
Part 1: p. 34-35: print missing. Some print faded and show-through and some pages stained. P. 30-end of part 3 of the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy spliced at end.
